Our featured properties offer superior design aesthetics coupled with functional living spaces maximizing natural light and ventilation We provide full transparency on carpet area and super area helping you make an informed decision on the ideal 2BHK apartment that perfectly fits your lifestyle needs and budget

locationsSection.title: Key Connectivity and Infrastructure Highlights of Sector 113 Gurugram
description: Sector 113 is quickly emerging as a highly sought-after residential destination primarily due to its enviable location along the 150-meter wide Dwarka Expressway which is the backbone of connectivity for new Gurugram This sector bridges the gap between the established parts of Gurgaon and the growing commercial centers of Haryana offering the best of both worlds

The infrastructure surrounding 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 113 is meticulously planned with wide roads green belts and proximity to major social amenities The strategic location ensures that residents enjoy reduced travel times to essential services high-quality education and healthcare making it an ideal place to establish roots

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About 2BHK Flats in Sector 113 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Find quick and detailed answers regarding the purchase process financing options connectivity and investment security in Sector 113 Gurugram

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 113
faqs.answer: The price range for 2BHK flats in Sector 113 varies significantly based on the specific project developer size and included amenities Generally the price starts from approximately ₹75 Lakhs and can go up to ₹130 Crore depending on whether it is a high-rise apartment or a premium builder floor Contact our property experts for the latest real-time pricing and specific unit availability within your preferred budget segment

faqs.question: Are the 2BHK properties in Sector 113 RERA registered
faqs.answer: Yes absolutely We ensure that all the primary projects offering 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 113 are fully compliant and registered under the Real Estate Regulatory Authority RERA This ensures transparency timely delivery and protection of buyer interests You can verify the RERA registration number for any specific project directly on the state RERA portal

faqs.question: What is the expected possession timeline for 2BHK flats in this sector
faqs.answer: Sector 113 offers a mix of inventory including both ready-to-move-in flats and under-construction projects Ready-to-move units offer immediate possession while the possession timeline for under-construction projects typically ranges from 12 to 36 months depending on the stage of development We can filter options specifically for immediate or near-term possession for you

faqs.question: How good is the connectivity of Sector 113 to Gurgaon and major Gurugram areas
faqs.answer: Connectivity is arguably the biggest strength of Sector 113 The sector is directly linked to the Dwarka Expressway offering immediate access to Sector 21 Dwarka and further into New Gurgaon Additionally it provides swift connectivity to major corporate hubs like Cyber City and Udyog Vihar via signal-free roads greatly improving the daily commute

faqs.question: Are home loan options available for purchasing a 2BHK in Sector 113
faqs.answer: Yes Major national and private banks and NBFCs offer excellent financing options for approved projects in Sector 113 Gurugram We maintain strong ties with leading financial institutions and can assist you in securing preferential interest rates and smooth loan processing covering up to 80-90% of the property value depending on eligibility

faqs.question: What are the typical amenities provided with 2BHK flats in this area
faqs.answer: Modern 2BHK complexes in Sector 113 are loaded with amenities intended for a high standard of living These typically include 100% power backup high-speed lifts round-the-clock security system a dedicated clubhouse swimming pool gymnasium children’s play areas and extensive green landscaping within the complex

faqs.question: Is buying a 2BHK flat in Sector 113 a good investment decision now
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 113 is considered a high-growth zone due to its strategic location on the Dwarka Expressway and proximity to the new diplomatic enclave The investment potential is strong driven by accelerating infrastructure development and high demand from tenants and end-users alike ensuring excellent capital appreciation over the next 3 to 5 years

faqs.question: What are the common sizes or carpet areas for these 2BHK apartments
faqs.answer: The common sizes for 2BHK flats vary but typically range from 950 square feet to 1300 square feet in Super Area The actual carpet area usually falls between 600 square feet to 850 square feet depending on the project layout and the developer’s specific design efficiency standards We provide detailed floor plans clearly outlining both areas for all listed properties

faqs.question: How close is Sector 113 to the IGI Airport Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Sector 113 is exceptionally close to the Indira Gandhi International Airport thanks to the Dwarka Expressway The travel time to the airport terminals is typically less than 20 minutes making it an extremely convenient location for frequent flyers and those working in the aviation sector This proximity boosts the rental value of 2BHK units significantly

faqs.question: Are maintenance costs included in the purchase price of the flat
faqs.answer: No maintenance costs are usually separate from the purchase price and are typically charged monthly or quarterly by the Resident Welfare Association RWA or the facility management company Post-possession these charges cover common area upkeep security services and utility backup The initial purchase may include a one-time maintenance security deposit
